summary: THE DASHBOARD BECAME DETACHED FROM THE CAR.  FOUND OUT THAT THERE WAS A RECALL AFTER IT HAD EXPIRED.  WE WERE NEVER NOTIFIED OF THE RECALL.  THE CAR IS VERY HARD TO DRIVE BECAUSE THE DASHBOARD IS WARPED AND IS SO HIGH UP IT IS HARD TO SEE OVER.  FORD IS A PIECE OF JUNK COMPANY AND WILL NOT DO ANYTHING ABOUT THIS.  I WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER FORD VEHICLE AGAIN.  THEY ARE A TERRIBLE COMPANY AND WILL NOT DEAL WITH THE PROBLEMS OF THEIR CARS.  GEE,,,,I WONDER WHY THEY STOPPED MAKING THE CONTOUR?????  *JB
